text: Hai ureueng mukmin iman keu Tuhan Ngon Rasul Tuhan bek na meuilah Iman keu kitab nyang tron bak Rasul Bandum takabui bek roh tabantah Meunan pih kitab nyang ka tron dilee Meuiman teuntee kitab bak Allah Soe-soe nyang kaphe akan Hadharat Ngon malaikat ngon kitab Allah Ngon Rasul pih lom uroe akhirat Ureueng nyan sisat jioh sileupah
